data.event: A post office was established there in 1908, and by 1914 the community had a population of fifty, a cotton gin, a general store, and telephone service.

event.title: a stop at La Gloria in 1914

data.event: The San Antonio and Aransas Pass Railway built a stop at La Gloria in 1914.
In 1936 the community consisted of a school and scattered dwellings and farms.
It remained a dispersed community in 1993.
